info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 8:33PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central El Paso County through 900 PM MDT... At 833 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Yoder, or 28 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yoder and Rush. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
